name: TROID BLASTER
description:
Troid Blaster is a physics based asteroids roguelike with permadeath and perks

* Random Levels- different each time.

* 10 different ships to buy and fly

* 5 different zones with different asteroid types

* Physics based system making game play much more dynamic

* Endless mode levels to unlock

* 360 controller support

* PermaDeath

(Exit to windows via button in top left of main menu screen)
